nodes.bodyText: Open for a different name. Can be reExportWorkspace
Could you add "entry" here?  I suspect that some day in the future the words "deleting workspace X" may be scary.

If you have a file like
id1
id2
id3
id4

This will delete each workspace entry individually.  Is that desirable?  We may want to collect all the workspace IDs in the file first.
Good point, I think it will be better to collect it and then call delete function with group of 20 ids each. Rather than sending all together as the numbers could be high (In my case its about 500)
The actual command to run is delete-workspace-rdr-export
Please add a log line after this one similar to the dry run
